text: Karl-Heinz "Kalle" Rummenigge (; born 25 September 1955) is a German football executive and former professional player. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Bayern Munich 1974–75 Bundesliga 21 5 3 1 4 0 — 28 6 1975–76 32 8 7 2 9 3 2 0 50 13 1976–77 31 12 5 2 6 1 4 0 46 15 1977–78 29 8 3 0 6 6 — 38 14 1978–79 34 14 2 0 — 36 14 1979–80 34 26 3 5 10 5 47 36 1980–81 34 29 3 4 8 6 45 39 1981–82 32 14 7 7 9 6 48 27 1982–83 34 20 2 0 6 1 42 21 1983–84 29 26 7 4 6 2 42 32 Total 310 162 42 25 64 30 6 0 422 217 Inter Milan 1984–85 Serie A 26 8 9 5 9 5 — 44 18 1985–86 24 13 6 2 9 3 39 18 1986–87 14 3 5 2 5 1 24 6 Total 64 24 20 9 23 9 — 107 42 Servette 1987–88 Super League 28 10 — — 28 10 1988–89 32 24 4 0 36 24 Total 60 34 4 0 — 64 34 Career total 434 220 62 34 91 39 6 0 593 293 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Germany 1976 2 0 1977 6 1 1978 12 4 1979 8 5 1980 10 4 1981 11 9 1982 13 9 1983 10 8 1984 8 1 1985 6 3 1986 9 1 Total 95 45 :Scores and results list West Germany's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Rummenigge goal.
